pages.text: Stasis of the Buff can make the target produce a magick phantom that stays in place, and the phantom can interact to a certain extent. $(br2)$(t:Raising these attributes for functional spells increases the benefit)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Benefit attributes：$(/t)$(t:Raising the Duration can increase gains)$(li2)$(#FFB90F)Duration$(/t)$()$(br2) When the height of the spell is greater than 192 blocks, it will change the current weather to rainy.
